languages.text: Оставил{mf||а} разрушенный алтарь на планете, забрав с собой его проклятый осколок.
Left the destroyed altar on the planet but took one cursed shard.
languages.original_text: Оставил{mf||а} разрушенный алтарь на планете, забрав с собой его проклятый осколок.

traits.locale_text: Left the destroyed altar on the planet but took one cursed shard.
Left the destroyed altar on the planet but took one cursed shard.
Left the destroyed altar on the planet but took one cursed shard.
Left the destroyed altar on the planet but took one cursed shard.
Left the destroyed altar on the planet but took one cursed shard.

languages.text: 你将被摧毁的祭坛留在了塔瑟拉，但却带走了一块诅咒碎片。
languages.original_text: Left the destroyed altar on the planet but took one cursed shard.

traits.locale_text: 你将被摧毁的祭坛留在了塔瑟拉，但却带走了一块诅咒碎片。

languages.text: 破壊した祭壇は惑星に残し、呪われた破片を一つだけ持ち帰った。
languages.original_text: Left the destroyed altar on the planet but took one cursed shard.

traits.locale_text: 破壊した祭壇は惑星に残し、呪われた破片を一つだけ持ち帰った。

languages.text: Has dejado el altar destruido en el planeta, pero te has llevado un fragmento maldito.
languages.original_text: Left the destroyed altar on the planet but took one cursed shard.

traits.locale_text: Has dejado el altar destruido en el planeta, pero te has llevado un fragmento maldito.

languages.text: Den zerstörten Altar auf dem Planeten zurückgelassen, aber einen verfluchten Splitter mitgenommen.
languages.original_text: Left the destroyed altar on the planet but took one cursed shard.

traits.locale_text: Den zerstörten Altar auf dem Planeten zurückgelassen, aber einen verfluchten Splitter mitgenommen.

languages.text: Yıkılan sunağın kalıntılarını gezegende bıraktın fakat lanetli parçalardan birini yanında götürdün.
languages.original_text: Left the destroyed altar on the planet but took one cursed shard.

traits.locale_text: Yıkılan sunağın kalıntılarını gezegende bıraktın fakat lanetli parçalardan birini yanında götürdün.

languages.text: Vous avez laissé l'autel détruit sur la planète, emportant avec vous l'un de ses fragments maudits.
languages.original_text: Left the destroyed altar on the planet but took one cursed shard.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez laissé l'autel détruit sur la planète, emportant avec vous l'un de ses fragments maudits.
